message.content:
cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.CR, cs.MM, cs.SY. 

The paper discusses covert communication techniques in wireless networks, which falls under the category of information theory (cs.IT) and networked systems (cs.NI). The paper also addresses security threats (cs.CR) and proposes the use of intelligent reflecting surfaces (cs.MM) to enhance communication covertness. The proposed approach involves smartly controlling the metasurface, which can be considered as a control system (cs.SY).
